creator: leonardo.anceschi@gmail.com
text:
I have developed an Appender that allows to log messages using the messenger 
service of Microsoft Windows (net send command).
How can I upload the source code?

Regards,
Leonardo Anceschi

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
Create an attachment to this enhancement report so that people can look at it.

Jake

I'm thinking of adding this as a contribution (i.e. in the contribs directory 
of the log4j distro, with the usual stipulations that implies).  OK?
creator: yoavs@computer.org

text:
Created attachment 22349
NetSendAppender source code jar (with proper mime type)
creator: thorbjoern@gmail.com
thorbjoern@gmail.com
text: I had a look at the source, and it does not use any Microsoft API but deals with a raw socket connection and byte streams.  Has it been integrated in SVN yet, and where?

creator: leonardo.anceschi@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #6)
> I had a look at the source, and it does not use any Microsoft API but deals
> with a raw socket connection and byte streams.  Has it been integrated in SVN
> yet, and where?
> 

Source code isn't in the repository.
I think it could be added in the "contribs directory", but I don't have the credentials. Can you help me?

Leo
